s2.title: Questions or Comments
s2.p: For all questions or comments, write to the &XercesCProjectName; mailing list.
If you are submitting a bug (and bug reports are definitely appreciated!), please provide the following information:

ul.li: Which OS platform/version you are using (NT4+SP4? Win98? Redhat Linux 6.0? Solaris2.6? AIX 4.3? HP-UX10? HP-UX11?)
Which compiler/version you are using (MSVC6? gcc? cc? aCC?)
Sample XML file that causes the bug
Sample Schema file (if required to recreate the bug)
Sample DTD file (if required to recreate the bug)
